mapper.select: SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_info, b.client_name, c.pet_name FROM appointment a, client b, pet c WHERE a.is_del = 0 AND a.client_id = b.client_id AND a.pet_id = c.pet_id AND doctor_id = #{doctorId} order by appointment_date desc

SELECT
b.doctor_name, c.pet_name, d.department_name FROM appointment a, doctor b, pet c, department d WHERE a.is_del = 0 AND a.doctor_id = b.doctor_id AND a.pet_id = c.pet_id AND a.department_id = d.department_id AND a.client_id = #{clientId} order by appointment_date desc

SELECT
b.client_name, c.pet_name, c.pet_photo, c.pet_variety, c.pet_sex, c.pet_age, d.department_name, a.is_suc FROM appointment a, client b, pet c, department d WHERE a.is_del = 0 AND a.client_id = b.client_id AND a.pet_id = c.pet_id AND a.department_id = d.department_id AND a.doctor_id = #{doctorId} order by a.is_suc, appointment_date desc
